patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell coffee and tea
We have coffee and tea
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days
Shipping takes 2-4 days
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

patterns: Can you tell me about the courses you offer?
Do you have any programming courses?
What are the most popular courses?
responses: We offer a wide range of courses including programming, data science, business, and more!
Our most popular courses are in web development, machine learning, and data analysis.
You can explore new courses under the 'New Courses' section on our homepage.

patterns: How do I enroll in a course?
What is the process for enrolling?
Can you guide me on how to sign up for a course?
How can I start a course?
responses: To enroll in a course, simply click on the 'Enroll Now' button on the course page.
You can start by creating an account, then selecting the course you're interested in and clicking 'Enroll'.
Just log in, find the course you want to take, and click 'Enroll'.

patterns: How much does a course cost?
Is there a fee for enrolling?
responses: We offer both free and paid courses. You can find pricing information on each course page.
Some of our courses are free, while others require a fee. Check the course details for specific pricing.
Course fees vary. Please visit the course page for exact pricing information.

patterns: Can I get a certificate after completing a course?
What type of certification do you offer?
Is there a certificate of completion?
responses: Yes, we offer certificates upon successful completion of our courses.
After completing a course, you can receive a certificate to showcase your achievement.
Certificates are available for most of our courses. Check the course details for specific information.

patterns: What is the duration of the courses?
Can you tell me the length of the courses?
How much time do I need to complete a course?
responses: Course durations vary. You can find this information on each course page.
Some courses are self-paced, while others have a fixed schedule. Check the course details for more information.
Course lengths range from a few hours to several weeks, depending on the topic and depth.

patterns: In which language are the courses offered?
Are the courses available in multiple languages?
What languages do you support for courses?
Can I take courses in Spanish?
Do you offer courses in languages other than English?
responses: Our courses are primarily offered in English, but we do have some courses available in other languages.
Yes, some courses are available in multiple languages. Please check the course details for specific language options.
We are expanding our language offerings, so keep an eye out for courses in your preferred language.

patterns: I need help with the website.
How can I get technical support?
I am facing issues accessing a course.
What should I do if a course won't load?
Who can I contact for technical issues?
responses: You can reach our technical support team through the 'Contact Us' page.
For technical issues, please email support@oursite.com, and we'll assist you as soon as possible.
Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, contact our support team.
